data.eml:eml: A new burrowing crayfish of the genus Fallicambarus Hobbs, 1969 (Decapoda: Cambaridae) from the Red River Drainage of the southcentral United States

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Taylor, Christopher A., Robison, Henry W. (2016): A new burrowing crayfish of the genus Fallicambarus Hobbs, 1969 (Decapoda: Cambaridae) from the Red River Drainage of the southcentral United States. Zootaxa 4144 (4): 575-583, DOI: http://doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4144.4.7
